title: Advertisement, "Set Shop: How to Get...", 1985
creditline: Gift of Tibor Kalman/ M & co.
description: A series of ideograms (for example, a roll of tape, a man tugging at his shirt collar) in hand-drawn style in black, interspersed with text imprinted in red sans serif type, occupies the full page. The Set Shop logo, consisting of the letter S in red stencil-style type rimmed by a circular red band imprinted in white with the Set Shop address and telephone number, is centered at the bottom of the page. Immediately to the right, business hours are imprinted on three lines in small black type.

tombstone.epitaph:
Advertisement, "Set Shop: How to Get...", 1985.
1985. Offset lithography. Gift of Tibor Kalman/ M & co.. 1993-151-252.
